1115060.name: Trace of the past
1115060.description: Trace of the Past — is a first- person horror game. It tells a mystical story of Charles Warren, who is the former pupil of a boarding school named 'Grief Hill'. After some mysterious events in childhood Charles`s, he got to a psychiatric hospital and lost a big part of his memories. After 19 years, he get`s an envelope with an old photo of him. The sender's address is 'Grief Hill'. But who sent it? For what purpose? The boarding school is long closed. Charles decides to find out and goes to meet his secret past.
